Thanks but one scene is cut on this European release (the first scene with the dog, which makes the second scene with it - which in this version becomes the first - quite confusing/pointless).
Better get the full version (US rip): http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/6270972/Ingmar_Bergman_-_En_Passion_%281969%29
